ðŸ“– Summary: The 'hide-my-mail-cloudflare' extension allows users to generate unique, random email addresses that forward to their actual inbox, enhancing privacy. It utilizes Cloudflare Email Routes and offers features like creating up to 200 anonymous emails and instant mailbox creation, and works across operating systems. The extension is client-side only, ensuring no data collection.
